pr_title: Add Maven version prerequisite for all Maven plugins

timeline.message:
Add Maven version prerequisite for all Maven plugins

This closes #4313

Signed-off-by: Konrad Windszus <kwin@apache.org>

timeline.bodyText:
We already use maven 3.6.3 (see mvnw) to build the maven plugins. This is also sort of wrong. I don't know what actual version of maven we need to build the plugins. We don't test building against an older version of maven, so this prerequisite is not in anyway known to be true.
We do however set the version of maven to compile against

  
    
      bnd/maven/pom.xml
    
    
         Line 18
      in
      417811e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <maven.target.version>3.1.1</maven.target.version> 
        
    
  


so that our plugins can be used with versions of maven back to 3.1.1. That is, we don't rely upon new maven API added since 3.1.1. It is our intention that the maven plugins can be used with older versions of maven.
It is not our intention to be able to build the maven plugins with older versions of maven. So this prerequisite is not accurate.
